name: Rated Sudoku
description:
Presented by Shajiao Games, this is a classic 9x9 Sudoku game comes loaded with lots of puzzles and features. The one game for all your Sudoku needs!

I have collected thousands of puzzles of different difficulty, rated by an algorithm, tailored for everyone's level. There is puzzles that are easy and good for beginners, and very difficult ones for advanced players. Players start at a lower rating. The more puzzles you solve, the more rating you earn and the harder puzzles you get to play. If you fail to solve a puzzle, you will lose rating. So you only play puzzles at your level.

Features and content (that is planned, but not all of them are guaranteed to release):
  • Play Sudoku puzzles with a rating, play harder puzzles as your rating grow （single player） (available now)
  • Pencilmarks and other useful tools and information for solving Sudoku puzzles (in development)
  • Play custom puzzles that you input or get random puzzles of a specific clue count or rating range（single player）(planned)
  • 6,000 puzzles of all difficulty and clue count (planned, and 2,000 are available now)
  • More than 100 each of 17 - 42 clue puzzles, yes, that is, 100 17 clues, 100 18 clues, 100 19 clues and so on, so you can play custom games with a clue count you prefer (planned)
  • Share puzzles with friends (single player) (planned)
  • Relaxing background music(available now)
  • Play 1v1 matchmaking game with others with a rating, gain or lose rating when you win or lose, whoever solve the same puzzle faster wins (rating system is similar to chess) (planned)
  • Play custom 1v1 games with friends or observe a custom 1v1 game, whoever solve the same puzzle faster wins (planned)
  • Single player match history and stats (planned)
  • Multiplayer match history and stats (planned)
  • Watch replay (planned)

Contact me if you have purchased the game, and would like to add some of the good puzzles that you think are great for everyone to enjoy! Also, any feature request from a player who purchased the game is welcome, but is not guaranteed to be implemented.

Note: this game is intended for 9x9 Sudoku only. Other board sizes are not planned.
